ecocenter.title: Your Eco Center Dashboard
ecocenter.subtitle: Track your energy usage to reduce your carbon footprint.
ecocenter.carbonLimitExceededMessage: Your current usage exceeds the daily limit of {{limit}} kg CO₂. Consider reducing appliance usage or duration.

hero.title: Track Your Carbon Footprint in Real-Time
hero.subtitle: Monitor your environmental impact in Kazakhstan's unique landscape with our dashboard designed for Central Asian lifestyles and climate challenges.
hero.joinUsers: Join {{count}}+ eco-conscious users making a difference

trackFootprint.title: Track Your Footprint
trackFootprint.description: Monitor your daily carbon emissions and see your environmental impact in real-time.

analyzeTrends.title: Analyze Trends
analyzeTrends.description: Visualize your progress over time with detailed charts and personalized insights.

calculateImpact.title: Calculate Impact
calculateImpact.description: Make informed decisions with our comprehensive carbon calculator tool.

news.title: Latest Climate News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed about climate change and carbon footprint news from trusted sources.

1.title: La Niña Has Ended, ENSO Neutral Conditions Prevail
1.excerpt: The La Niña event has officially ended, with the tropical Pacific returning to ENSO-neutral conditions...

2.title: March 2025: Second Warmest on Record
2.excerpt: March 2025 was the second warmest globally and the hottest March in Europe...

3.title: Economic Risks from Climate Change Intensify
3.excerpt: A report warns of profound economic risks from climate change, including rising temperatures and severe weather events...

4.title: Central Asia Heatwave Intensified by Climate Change
4.excerpt: A late-March heatwave in Central Asia saw temperatures up to 15°C above seasonal averages...

calculator.title: Your Carbon Footprint Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Discover your environmental impact and get personalized suggestions to reduce your carbon footprint.
calculator.formulaText: Total Emissions = Σ (Activity Data × Emission Factor)
calculator.activityData: Activity Data = Your input (e.g., distance driven)
calculator.emissionFactor: Emission Factor = Standard CO₂ equivalent per unit (from EPA/IPCC)

dashboard.subtitle: Track your progress and environmental impact

shop.subtitle: Discover eco-friendly products for a greener lifestyle

chatbot.title: AI Carbon Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Get personalized advice to reduce your carbon footprint
chatbot.placeholder: Ask me about reducing your carbon footprint...
chatbot.example1: How can I reduce my transportation emissions?
chatbot.example2: What are the best eco-friendly products?
chatbot.example3: How to make my home more energy efficient?
chatbot.error: Sorry, I couldn't process your request. Please try again.
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI carbon assistant. How can I help you reduce your environmental impact today?

live.title: Live Environmental Data
live.subtitle: Real-time environmental monitoring and weather information

footer.description: Making carbon footprint tracking simple and actionable
footer.carbonFootprintDescription: A carbon footprint is the total amount of greenhouse gases, particularly carbon dioxide (CO₂), that are emitted directly or indirectly by human activities. It is measured in equivalent tons of CO₂ (tCO₂e) and includes emissions from sources like transportation, energy consumption, food production, and industrial processes.
footer.connectDescription: Join our community of eco-conscious individuals working together to combat climate change. Share your journey, learn from others, and be part of the solution.

shop.title: Sustainable Products
shop.subtitle: Browse our collection of eco-friendly products to reduce your carbon footprint and support sustainable living
shop.noProductsMessage: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria to find what you're looking for.

joinCommunity.title: Join Community
joinCommunity.description: Connect with climate activists and make a difference together.

donate.title: Donate
donate.description: Support organizations fighting climate change globally.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Participate in local tree-planting and clean-up events.

showcase.title: Preserving the Beauty of Central Asia
showcase.description: From the vast steppes to the snow-capped peaks of Tian Shan, Kazakhstan's diverse landscape inspires our commitment to environmental protection and sustainable living.
